# Pepperjack Loves Flags

&nbsp;

> Â»*Hold my flag.*Â«<br>
>  â€” Pepperjack, probably

**Pepperjack Loves Flags** is a tiny, fun web app that lets you choose a flag, watch Pepperjack (the Catppuccin mascot) hold it proudly, and download the result as a PNG.  

Built for shits and giggles. ðŸ’œ <br>
Not an official Catppuccin product!â„¢

&nbsp;

## âœ¨ Features

- **Works entirely client-side â€” no uploads, no tracking, no nonsense**
- Pick from a huge list of flags
- Live preview of Pepperjack holding your chosen flag
- Optional outline styles and themes
- Instant PNG download

&nbsp;

## ðŸ–¼ Credits

- **Pepperjack** â€“ Mascot of [Catppuccin](https://catppuccin.com/) (used here with love, but not affiliated)
- **Flags** â€“ Based on the open-source [Twemoji](https://twemoji.twitter.com/) set by Twitter

&nbsp;

## ðŸš€ Run it yourself!

1. Clone the repo:
```bash
git clone git@github.com:unseen-ninja/flaggerjack.git
cd flaggerjack
```

2. Install dependencies:
```bash
pnpm install
```

3. Run the dev server:
```bash
pnpm run dev
```

4. Open your browser and start waving some flags. ðŸŽŒ
